channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: I giant human poo with paper, 8th November
item.description:
There is a big poo with flies and a small piece of paper over it. Obviously human.

item.title: Overflowing bin causing other litter problems, 8th November
item.description:
This is a constant ongoing problem for months as you can see by previous reports, and although bin is now emptied on a more regular basis it is clearly not enough. Also the dumped bin is now also being used for rubbish plus the surrounding planters. The whole area including the top of heathfield road has now constant litter problem.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Heathfield Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 8th November
item.description:
This was reported a few days ago. Seeing that the council are getting strict on flytipping, why are these items still there?.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchbury Road, Middle Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Terrible road vibrations, 8th November
item.description:
When a bus or lorry gets to certain part of the road (opposite service road between 67 & 69 Wellington Ave) it causes terrible vibrations to the houses along the front, it’s so bad that furniture and beds are shaking and cracks are appearing in the walls. This has been reported many times and always told that there is No problem. Obviously there is. In the last 2 years we have re-plastered and cracks are appearing again.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 67, Wellington Avenue, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road closed off to residents with no prior warning, blocking access, 8th November
item.description:
Today they have closed off part of Trundleys Road outside the new build Ironworks, there have been no warning whatsoever to local residents and will be closed till midnight, they are blocking access to local residents with no regards whatsoever. The construction is managed by HG constructions
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Trundley's Road, New Cross Gate, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal hot dog vendor, 8th November
item.description:
Hello. Not sure how best to report this. Please forward as necessary. There is an illegal hot dog stand outside the Elephant and Castle pub late at night, certainly on Fridays and Saturdays. He leaves greasy stains on the pavement that you kindly cleaned up last week, as well as obviously not being regulated. Please would you sort him out.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elephant and Castle, Elephant and Castle, London
Report on FixMyStreet
